import { Center } from '@react-three/drei'; import React from 'react'; export function About() { return (

About cosmosapiens

Ever wanted to take part in space colonization? Well you're about to cop your one-way ticket to the sickest clubhouse on the block...chain.
Cosmosapiens are the result of human-computer cooperation, each is unique and programmatically generated from over 170 possible traits, including expression, headwear, clothing, and more.
All apes are dope, but some are rarer than others. The apes are stored as ERC-721 tokens on the Ethereum blockchain and hosted on IPFS. (See Record and Proof.) Purchasing an ape costs 0.08 ETH.
To access members-only areas such as THE BATHROOM, Apeholders will need to be signed into their Metamask Wallet.

The pack

Marketing Lead

Community Lead

); }
